tuv.seg: Do Checks and Updates of All Books
Open the HTML used to make this PDF, in Browser
Bar damar yin canje-canje a cikin gidan wannan littafin
Bloom normally prevents most changes to shellbooks. If you need to add pages, change images, etc., tick the box below.
Dama dai Bloom ya hana canje-canje a cikin gidan litattafai.Idan kana son Ƙara shafi ɗaya ko fiye, ko sanya wasu hotuna, da sauran su, sai ka sa alama a cikin akwatin da ke Ƙasa.

tu.note: This is very low priority for translation.

tuv.seg: Bloom recording is in an unusual state, possibly caused by unplugging a microphone. You will need to restart.
Ɗaukar sautin Bloom na fuskantar matsala, mai yiwuwa wannan ya faru ne ta sanadiyyar cire bututun magana. Zaka buƙaci Ka kashe ka sake kunnawa.
Babu abin haɗawa zuwa cikin na'ura
This computer appears to have no sound recording device available. You will need one to record audio for a talking book.
Da alama wannan na'ura mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ba ta da kayan ɗaukar murya. Za ka buƙaci ɓuƙaci guda domin ɗaukar murya saboda littafi mai magana.

tu.note: Appears when the speak/record button is pressed very briefly

tuv.seg: Please hold the button down until you have finished recording
Idan ka yarda ka danna abin dannawa ƙasa har sai ka gama ɗaukar muryar

tu.tuid: BackMatter.Factory.If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.

tuv.seg: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.

tu.tuid: BackMatter.Factory.If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.

tuv.seg: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.

Possibly this is an old Bloom Pack created before Bloom Packs could handle special characters in file names. You may be able to get the author to re-create it using a current version. If that's not possible a technical expert may be able to repair things.

Mai yiwuwa wannan tsohon shirin Bloom ne wanda aka ƙirƙiro kafin shirin Bloom ya fara amfani da mai Haruffa na musamman a cikin sunayen kundin ajiye bayani. Za ka iya samun marubucin don sake ƘirƘiro maka shi ta hanyar amfani da wannan sabon shirin. Idan hakan bai samu ba, Ƙwararre kan irin wannan harkar zai iya gyara abubuwan.
Sa Shirin Bloom a cikin na'ura mai ƙwaƙwalwa
The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
Yanzu {0} za'a iya amfani da shirye shiryen a cikin wannan na'ura.

tu.note: Displayed as the message box title

tuv.seg: Abu mai saka shirye-shirye a cikin na'ura mai ƙwaƙwalwa.
This BloomPack appears to be incomplete or corrupt.
Wannan ƙunshin shirye-shirye na Bloom kamar ba cikakakke ba ne ko kuma gurɓatacce ne.
Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack
Bloom ya kasa saka wancan Ƙunshin shire-shire na Bloom

tu.note: Shown while Bloom Packs are being installed

tuv.seg: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
Bloom yana gudana, amma abubuwan da ke cikinsa ba za su bayyana ba har sai lokaci na gaba sa'adda ka sake gudanar da Bloom
The Bloom collection will not be installed.
Ba za'a sanya maka ƙunshin shirye-shirye na Bloom ba.
This computer already has a Bloom collection named '{0}'. Do you want to replace it with the one from this Bloom Pack?
Wannan na'ura mai ƙwaƙwalwa dama tana da abubuwan da Bloom ya ƙunsa mai suna '{0}'. Ko kana son ka maye gurbinsa da wanda ke cikin wannan Ƙunshin shirin Bloom?
Bloom Packs should have only a single collection folder at the top level of the .ZIP file.
Kamata ya yi kowane Ƙunshin shirin Bloom su kasance sun haɗa tarin abubuwa a wuri ɗaya a saman kundin .ZIP.
Bloom was not able to remove the existing copy of '{0}'. Quit Bloom if it is running & try again. Otherwise, try again after restarting your computer.
Bloom bai iya cire kofin da yake ciki yanzu '{0}'. Fita daga Bloom in baya yi sannan ka sake gwadawa kuma. Ko kuma, ka sake gwadawa bayan ka kashe, ka sake kunna na'urar.

tu.note: When you hold down a key, a popup appears that lets you choose a related character. These instructions are shown in that popup.

tuv.seg: To select, use your mouse wheel or point at what you want, then release the key.
Don zaɓe, ka yi amfani da kusun na'urarka ko ka nuna abinda kake so, sannan ka saki abinda ka danna.
This formatting is the default for all text boxes with '{0}' style
Wannan tsarin shine wanda ya fito tun daga kamfani ga dukkan akwatunan rubutu '{0}' irin salon ke nan

Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\n
Current size is {2}pt.
Chanjin yanayin girman rubutun ga dukan akwatuna da ke ɗauke da tsarin '{0}' da yare '{1}'.\nGirman rubutun yanzu shine {2}pt.
This formatting is for all text boxes with '{0}' style
Wannan shirin na kowane akwatin rubutu ne mai tsarin '{0}'
This formatting is for all {0} text boxes with '{1}' style
Wannan shirin na kowane akwatin rubutun {0} mai tsarin '{1}'
Sorry, Reader Templates do not allow changes to formatting.
Yi haƙuri, Muhallin Maikaratu ba ya bayar da damar yin canje-canje don shirin ba.

It appears that some part of the folder path to this book has been moved or renamed. As a result, Bloom cannot save your changes to this page, and will need to exit now. If you haven't been renaming or moving things, please click Details below and report the problem to the developers.

Da alamar wani ɓangaren turbar akwatin shiga wannan littafin an cire shi ko canja mashi suna. A sakamakon haka, Bloom ba zai iya ajiye canje-canjen wannan shafin da ka yi ba, buƙatar yanzu itace fita. Idan ba ka cire ko tura abubuwa ba, idan ka yarda ka dangwala akan Bayanan da ke ƙasa kuma ka aika da rahoton matsalar zuwa ga waɗanda suka ƙirƙiro manhajar.
Da kanshi zai sanya sabbin shiSrye-shirye na Bloom
Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)
Nuna Umarnan Gwaji (misali, Fitar da XML domin Zayyani na ciki)
Nuna Muhallan Gwaji (misali, ƙamus din hotuna)

tu.note: This option will probably go away, as any bugs with the Image Server get ironed out. This has to do with how Bloom works internally; the I.S. makes it work better on slow computers.

tuv.seg: Use Image Server to reduce memory usage with large images.
Yi amfani da Rumbun Surorori na yanar gizo don rage yin amfani da sashen ajiyar bayanai da ke da manyan surori.
Bloom is switching the default font for "{0}" to the new "Andika New Basic".
Bloom na juyar da tsarin da ya fito daga kamfani na haruffa "{0}" zuwa sabon "Andika New Basic".
This will improve the printed output for most languages. If your language is one of the few that need "Andika", you can switch it back in Settings:Book Making.
Wannan zai inganta abubuwan da aka wallafa na yawancin harsuna. Idan harshenka na ɗaya daga cikin wasu harsunan da ke buƙatar "Andika", kana iya komawa baya a cikin wurin yin Saiti: Yin Littafi.

tu.note: {0} is a language name.

tuv.seg: Harafn da kamfani ya tsaro ne {0}
Select languages that are written from right to left

tu.note: In a vernacular collection, we say 'Vernacular Language', but in a source collection, Vernacular has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.
If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

tuv.seg: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
Bloom zai rufe ya kuma sake buɗe wannan aikin da sabon saiti.

tu.note: Name of a Front/Back Matter Pack that puts credits on the inside of the front cover
Name of the default Front/Back Matter Pack

tuv.seg: Bloom will now open this HTML document in your word processing program (normally Word or LibreOffice). You will be able to work with the text and images of this book. These programs normally don't do well with preserving the layout, so don't expect much.

Yanzu Bloom zai buɗe wadannan takardun HTLM a cikin manhajar rubuta kalmominka (wanda ake kira Word ko LibreOffice). Za ka iya yin aiki da rubutu da hotunan wannan littafin. Akasari waɗannan manhajojin ba sukan yi aiki da kyau ba a wurin ajiye shimfiɗar littafi, don haka kar ka za ci abinda ya fi haka.
Kai zuwa XML don yin Zayyana...
Litattafai daga ɗakin karatun yanar gizo na BloomLibrary.org
Buɗe wurin ajiye bayani akan Faifai
Make a book using this source
Yi littafi ta hanyar amfani da wannan tushen
Create a book in my language using this source book
Ƙirƙiro littafi a cikin harshena ta hanyar amfani da wannan littafin tushe

tu.note: This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere
This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere
Shown as the thumbnail caption when the book doesn't have a title
Shown when Bloom tries to check for an update but can't, for example because it can't connect to the internet, or a problems with our server, etc.

tuv.seg: Could not connect to the server to check for an update. Are you connected to the internet?
Ba a iya sada ka da yanar gizo don bincikawa ko akwai sabuntawa. Ko ka na haɗe da layin sadarwar yanar gizo?
Your Bloom is up to date.
Bloom is already working on checking for updates.
Bloom na kan aikin binciken sabunta bayanai.
A new version appears to be available, but Bloom could not install it.
An nuna cewa akwai wata sabuwar manhaja, amma Bloom ba ya iya sa ta.

tu.note: Appears after Bloom has downloaded a program update in the background and is ready to switch the user to it the next time they run Bloom.

tuv.seg: A new version of Bloom is available.

tu.note: The {0} is where we fill in the name of the Vernacular

tuv.seg: Make a book using this template
Ka yi Muhallin Maikaratu na manhajar Bloom...
Your system administrator manages Bloom updates for this computer.
Mai kula da na'urarka mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa yana sarrafa sabunta Bloom ga wannan na'urar.

tu.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library

tuv.seg: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
Samu ƙarin littafai daga ɗakin karatun Bloom na yanar gizo a BloomLibrary.org

tu.note: get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

tuv.seg: Wurin da za a samu Sabbin Littafai
This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
An rufe wannan tarin bayanai, saboda haka ba a iya ƙara ko cire sabbin littafai.

Because this is a source collection, Bloom isn't offering any existing shells as sources for new shells. If you want to add a language to a shell, instead you need to edit the collection containing the shell, rather than making a copy of it. Also, the Wall Calendar currently can't be used to make a new Shell.

Saboda wannan asalin tari ne, Bloom ba ya bayar da kowace irin kumba a matsayin tushen sabuwar kumba.Idan kana son ƙara wani harshe ga wata kumba, kana buƙatar yin gyare-gyaren tarin bayanan da ke ƙunshe a kumba, ba yin kwafin sa ba. Haka kuma, ba za a iya amfani da Kalandar Bango ba a halin yanzu don yin wata sabuwar kumba.

tu.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and get some explanation of why some books are hidden
Brings up the localization dialog

tuv.seg: Buɗe ko ka Ƙirƙiri Wani tarin bayanai
Wurin da za a samu Sabbin Kumbuna

tu.note: In a wizard, this button takes you to the previous step.
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
This is shown when Bloom is slowly loading something, so the user doesn't worry about why they don't see the result immediately.
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
In a wizard, this button takes you to the next step.

tuv.seg: Open a Letter and Word List File
Buɗe Kundin jerin Harafi da Kalma
A bar kalmomi a cikin wannan matakin
The following is a generated report of the decodable stages for {0}. You can make any changes you want to this file, but Bloom will not notice your changes. It is just a report.

Abin da ke biye rahoton da aka haɗa ne na matakan karɓau na {0}. Kana iya yin duk wani canjin da kake buƙata ga wannan kundin ajiye bayanan, amma Bloom ba zai kula da canje-canjenka ba. Rahoto ne kawai.
Bloom can handle only the first {0} words.
Bloom zai iya kula da kalmomin farko na {0}
Generate a letter and word list report
Tara wani rahoton jerin harafi da kalma
Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections.
An kammala sauke maka {0}.Zaka iya ganin shi a cikin Littafai daga Ɗakin Karatun Blom na yanar gizo BloomLibrary.org a bangaren Tarin bayanai.

Bloom downloaded the book but had problems making it available in Bloom. Please restart your computer and try again. If you get this message again, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom developers

Bloom ya sauke littafin amma ya haɗu da matsalar kawo shi a Bloom. Don Allah ka kashe na'urarka ka sake kunnata.Idan ka sake samun wannan saƙon, don Allah ka dangwala malatsin 'Details' ka aika da rahoton matsalar ga waɗanda suka gina Bloom
There was a problem downloading your book.
An samu wata matsala a lokacin saukar da littafinka

tu.note: This is for the button that LAUNCHES the dialog, not the "Add this page" button that is IN the dialog.
This is for the button inside the dialog

tuv.seg: Zabi wata shimfidar littafi ta daban...
Converting to this layout will cause some content to be lost.
Mayarwa zuwa wannan shimfidar zai iya sa a yi asarar wasu abubuwa .
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.
Idan kana son ka sa ƙarin bayani game da littafin a wani wuri, kana iya amfani da wannan shafin, wanda yake a cikin marfin baya.
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the front cover.
Idan kana son ka sa ƙarin bayani game da littafin a wani wuri, kana iya amfani da wannan shafin, wanda yake a cikin marfin gaba.
If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.
Idan kana son ka sa ƙarin bayani game da littafin a wani wuri, kana iya amfani da wannan shafin, wanda yake a cikin marfin baya.
Open the HTML used to make this PDF, in Firefox (must be on path)
Bude HTML ɗin da aka yi amfani da shi wurin wannan PDF, a cikin manhajar Firefox (dole ya kasance kan turba)
Sorry, the copyright and license for this book cannot be changed.
Yi hanƙuri, haƙƙin mallaka da izinin wannan littafin ba su canzuwa.
Sorry, this book is locked down so that images cannot be changed.
Yi hankuri, an kulle wannan littafin ta yadda ba za a iya canja surori ba.
Ka tabbata za ka share shafi?
This page will be permanently removed.
Za a cire wannan har abada.

tu.note: Shown between 'Picture' and 'Text' when Custom Page is in Layout mode

tuv.seg: This word is not decodable in this stage.
Wannan kalmar ba karbau ba ce a wannan matakin.
1) Check that you are recording into the correct device and that these levels are showing blue:
1) Ka tabbatar da kana ɗaukar sauti a cikin na'urar da ta dace kuma waɗannan matakan suna nuna shuɗiyar kala:
2) Ka dubi jimlar da aka yi ma alama
You cannot change these because this is not the original copy.
Ba ka iya canja wannan saboda ba littafin asali ba ne.
The current selected font is '{0}', but it is not installed on this computer. Some other font will be used.
Girman harafin da aka zaɓa yanzu shine '{0}' amma ba a sa shi a ƙwaƙwalwar wannan na'ura mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ba. Za a yi amfani da girman wasu harufa.

Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\n
Current size is {2}pt.
Canjin yanayin girman rubutun ga dukkan akwatuna da ke dauke da tsarin '{0}' da harshe '{1}'.\nGirma yanzu shine {2}pt.
That style already exists. Please choose another name.
Wannan tsarin da ma akwai shi. Don Allah ka zabi wani suna.
Ba ka ganin abin da kake bukata?
Change the spacing between lines of text
Canja girman filin da ke tsakanin layukan rubutu
Please use only alphabetical characters. Numbers at the end are ok, as in "part2".
Don Allah ka yi amfani da haruffa bakake kawai. Sa lambobi a ƙarshe ya yi daidai, kamar a cikin"kashi na 2".
Canja girman filin da ke tsakanin kalmomi
When you are making an original book, use this box to record contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc.
A lokacin da kake yin littafin asali, ka yi amfani da wannan akwatin don ɗaukar gudunmawa da wasu marubuta suka bayar, masu zayyana da kuma masu tace bayanai da sauransu.
When you make a book from a shell, use this box to tell who did the translation.
A lokacin da kake yin littafi daga cikin kumba, ka yi amfani da wannan akwatin ka faɗi wanda ya yi fassarar.

tu.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

tuv.seg: You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.
Kana iya amfani da wannan filin don marubuci/mai zayyana, ko wani abu na daban.
Click to Edit Copyright and License
Dangwala ka yi gyara ga Haƙƙin Mallaka da Izini
Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
Ka yi amfani da wannan domin godiya ga duk wata gudunmawar kudi daga kungiyoyi.
International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
Lambar Ingancin Littafi ta ƙasa da kasa. Kabar fili idan ba ka da ɗaya daga waɗannan.
The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
Taimakon da marubuta, masu zayyana, masu gyaran rubutu da sauran su suka bayar cikin {lang}
Godiya don fassarar da aka yi cikin {lang}
To unlock this shellbook, go into the toolbox on the right, find the gear icon, and click 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.
Don buɗe wannan littafin kumba, ka shiga akwati a hannunka na dama, ka duba alamar gear, sai ka dangwala 'Allow changes to this shellbook'.
Gyara Ta'allaƙar Sura, Haƙƙin Mallaka da kuma Izini
This book is locked down as shell. Are you sure you want to change the picture?
Yi amfani da Kundin Ajiya na JPEG

The file you’ve chosen is a “JPEG” file.
JPEGfiles are perfect for photographs and color artwork.
However, JPEG files are a big problem for black and white line art.
Problems include:
 • Fuzziness and grey dots.
 • Large file sizes, making the book hard to share.
 • If there are many large JPEGs, Bloom may not have enough memory to make PDF files.


Note: Because JPEG is “lossy”, converting a JPEG to PNG, TIFF, or BMP actually makes things even worse.
If this is black and white line art, you want to get an original scan in one of those formats.

 Please select from one of the following, then click “OK”:

Kundin ajiyar da ka zaɓa na "JPEG" ne.Kundayen JPEG na da kyau a wurin aikin hotuna da fasahar sarrafa kaloli.Duk da haka, kundayen JPEG wata babbar matsala ce ga aikin fasahar layin baki da fari.Matsalolin sun haɗa da:
 • Dushi-dushi da ɗige ɗige ruwan toka.
 • Girman manyan kundaye, su sa littafin ya yi wahalar rarrabawa.
• Idan akwai JPEG manya da yawa, me yiwuwa Bloom ba zai samu wurin yin kundayen PDF yalwatacce ba.

 Kula: Saboda JPEG mai "kabarniya" ne, mayar da JPEG ɗin zuwa PNG, TIFF ko BMP haƙiƙa na kara munana abubuwa Idan wannan aikin fasahar yin layi baki da fari ne, ka na son samun majarrabin asali na waɗancan tsarukan.

 Don Allah ka zaɓa daga waɗannan abubuwan da ke biyowa, sannan ka dangwala "OK":
This sentence is too long for this level.
Wannan jimlar ta yi tsawo ga wannan matakin.

tu.note: Default file and folder name when you make a new book, but haven't give it a title yet.

tuv.seg: Before you can paste an image, copy one onto your 'clipboard', from another program.
Kafin ka iya shimfiɗa wata sura, ka yi kofin ta a allon kofinka 'clipboard', daga wata manhaja.
Choose a page size and orientation
Ka zaɓi girman shafi da tsari
You cannot put anything in there while making an original book.
Ba ka iya sa komai a can ciki idan kana yin littafin asali.
Change the spacing between lines of text
Canja girman filin da ke tsakanin layukan rubutu
Canja girman filin da ke tsakanin layukan rubutu

tu.note: This label indicates a page with one arithmetic problem on it.
This label indicates a page with two arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with three arithmetic problems on it.
This label indicates a page with four arithmetic problems on it.

tuv.seg: Wannan Shafin ba Kome A cikinsa
A blank page that allows you to add items.
Shafin da ba kome a cikinsa wanda zai baka damar kara wani abu.
Page with a picture on top and a large, centered word below.
Shafi da hoto a sama, da ƙatuwar kalma a tsakiya daga ƙasa.
Choose language to make this a bilingual or trilingual book
Zaɓi harshe don mayar da wannan littafin a cikin harshe biyu ko uku
You need to select some text before you can copy it
Kana buƙatar zaɓen wani rubutu kafin ka yi kwafin shi
You need to select some text before you can cut it
Kana buƙatar zaɓen wani rubutu kafin ka yanke shi
Remove this page from the book
Cire wannan shafin daga cikin littafin
Zaɓi wani tsarin littafi na daban
Insert a new page which is a duplicate of this one
Sa wani sabon shafi wanda ya ke maimaicin wannan ne
There is nothing on the Clipboard that you can paste here.
Babu wani abu akan allon kwafi da zaka iya shimfidawa a nan.
Babu wani abun da za a cire

tu.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for bilingual mode, 2 languages per page
get this after you edit the metadata of an image

tuv.seg: Copy this information to all other pictures in this book?
A yi kwafin wannan bayanin kan dukkan hotunan da ke cikin wannan littafin?
This option is only available in the Publish tab.
Ana iya samun wannan zaɓin a sashen Wallafa kawai.

tu.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for monolingual mode, one language per page
Show in the layout chooser dropdown of the edit tab, if there was only a single layout choice

tuv.seg: There are no other layout options for this template.
Babu wasu zaɓe-zaɓen tsarin shimfidar littafi ga wannan muhallin.
This box has more text than will fit
Wannan akwatin na da rubutu fiye da yadda ya kamata ya ɗauka
A container on this page is overflowing
Abinda ke ɗauke da abubuwa akan wannan shafin yana malala

tu.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

tuv.seg: Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong.
Bloom ya samu matsalar nuna wannan littafin.Wannan ba ya na nufin cewa ka rasa aikinka ba, amma yana nufin wani abu ya tsufa, ko ya ɓata, ko kuma ya samu matsala.

Bloom had a problem showing this book. This doesn't mean your work is lost, but it does mean that something is out of date, is missing, or has gone wrong. Consider using the 'Report a Problem' command under the 'Help' menu.

Bloom ya samu matsalar nuna wannan littafin. Wannan ba ya na nufin cewa ka rasa aikinka ba, amma yana nufin wani abu ya tsufa, ko ya ɓata ko kuma ya samu matsala. Yi amfani da umurnin 'Kai Rahoton Matsala' a karkashin jerin 'Taimako'.

Bloom was unable to start its own HTTP listener that it uses to talk to its embedded Firefox browser. If this happens even if you just restarted your computer, ask someone to investigate if you have an aggressive firewall product installed. The agressive firewall product may need to be uninstalled before you can use Bloom.

Bloom ya kasa kunna masaurarin HTTP da ta ke amfani da shi a wurin sadarwa da yanar gizon Firefox da ta ke amfani da shi.Idan wannan na faruwa ko da ka kashe kuma ka sake kunna na'urarka mai ƙwaƙwalwa, ka nemi wani ya bincika ko ka saka wata garkuwan kariya mai kai farmaki a cikin na'urarrka. Akwai bukatar cire garkuwan kariya mai kai farmaki daga cikin na'urarka kafin ka iya amfani da Bloom.
Bloom had trouble saving a page. Please click Details below and report this to us. Then quit Bloom, run it again, and check to see if the page you just edited is missing anything. Sorry!
Your computer denied Bloom access to the book. You may need technical help in setting the operating system permissions for this file.
Na'urarka mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ta hana Bloom ya kai ga littafin. Kana buƙatar taimakon ƙwararre don saitin neman yardar na'urar don wannan kundin ajiye bayanan.
There was a problem selecting the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

An sami matsala a wurin zaɓen littafin. Kashewa da sake kunna Bloom zai iya magance wannan matasalar.Idan bai yi ba, don Allah ka dangwala malatsin 'Details' ka aika da rahoton matsalar ga wadanda suka gina Bloom.
There was a problem updating the book. Restarting Bloom may fix the problem. If not, please click the 'Details' button and report the problem to the Bloom Developers.

An sami matsala a wurin sabunta bayanan littafin. Kashewa da sake kunna Bloom zai iya magance wannan matasalar.Idan bai yi ba, don Allah ka dangwala malatsin 'Details' ka aika da rahoton matsalar ga wadanda suka gina Bloom.

tu.note: {0} will get the name of the book, {1} will give a link to open the Bloom Library Web page.

tuv.seg: {0} requires a newer version of Bloom. Download the latest version of Bloom from {1}
{0} na buƙatar sabon Bloom. Ka sauke sabon Bloom daga {1}
Bloom had a problem deleting this file: {0}
Bloom ya samu matsalar share wannan kundin: {0}
Bloom had a problem importing this picture.
Bloom ya samu matsalar kawo wannan hoton.
Report this problem to Bloom Support
Kai rahoton wannan matsalar a wurin Agajin Bloom
Yi hakuri, an ɗan sami matsala.

This Book called for Front/Back Matter pack named '{0}', but Bloom couldn't find that on this computer.
You can either install a Bloom Pack that will give you '{0}', or go to Settings:Book Making and change to another Front/Back Matter Pack.

Wannan Littafin ya nemi Makunshin Aikin Rubutun Gaba/Baya mai suna '{0}'. amma Bloom ya kasa samun shi a wannan na'ura mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa. Ko dai ka sa Makunshin Bloom a na'urarka wanda zai baka '{0}', ko kuma ka je wurin saitin:Yin Littafi ka canja zuwa wani Makunshin Aikin Rubutu na Gaba/Baya.

Bloom cannot start properly, and this symptom has been observed on machines with ZoneAlarm installed. Note: disabling ZoneAlarm does not help. Nor does restarting with it turned off. Something about the installation of ZoneAlarm causes the problem, and so far only uninstalling ZoneAlarm has been shown to fix the problem.

Bloom ba ya kunnawa yadda ya kamata, kuma wannan alamar an shaida ta a na'urori da aka sa ma ZoneAlarm.Kula: Hana ZoneAlarm ba zai taimaka ba.Haka ma kashewa da sake kunnata. Wani abu game da saka ZoneAlarm na haddasa matsaloli, don haka cire shi daga na'urarka mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ne kawai aka nuna zai magance matsalar.
This page is an experimental prototype which may have many problems, for which we apologize.
Wannan shafin na gwaji ne wanda ka iya samun matsaloli da dama, kuma muna neman afuwa kan wannan.

tu.tuid: FrontMatter.Factory.*You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.

tuv.seg: *You may use this space for author/illustrator, or anything else.

tu.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.
Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.
Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

tu.tuid: FrontMatter.Factory.International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.

tuv.seg: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.

tu.tuid: FrontMatter.Factory.The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
tu.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

tuv.seg: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}

tu.tuid: FrontMatter.Factory.Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.

tuv.seg: Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.

A component of Bloom, BloomPdfMaker.exe, seems to be missing. This prevents previews and printing. Antivirus software sometimes does this. You may need technical help to repair the Bloom installation and protect this file from being deleted again.

Wani ɓangaren Bloom mai suna BloompdfMaker.exe, ga alama ya ɓata. Wannan na hana kallon aikin da akayi da kuma wallafawa. Manhajar garkuwa mafi yawancin lokaci yana aikata hakan.Kana iya neman taimakon ƙwararre don gyara sa Bloom da kuma kare wannan kundin bayanai daga ƙara sharewa.

tu.note: Appears in progress indicator

tuv.seg: This script is right to left
Wannan rubutun an yi shi ne da tsarin rubutun dama zuwa hagu
Wannan rubutun na buƙatar dogayen layuka

tu.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format

tuv.seg: Faɗin Kashi ɗaya bisa huɗu na Wasiƙa
How to make a great leveled reader
I accept the terms of the license agreement
Na yarda da sharuɗɗan yarjejeniyar izini
I agree to the Bloom Library's Terms of Use
Na yarda da sharuɗɗan amfani da Ɗakin karatu na Bloom Library
Ka shiga zauren yanar gizo na ɗakin karatu na BloomLibrary.org
Kuma a Nuna Kalmar neman Izinin Shiga
There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\n Please pick a unique name.
Akwai wani tarin bayanan da ke da wannan sunan, a {0}.\n Don Allah ka ɗauki sunan da babu irinsa.
Choose the Main Language For This Collection
Ka zaɓi jigon harshe don wannan tarin bayanai
What would you like to call this collection?
Me kake buƙatar kiran wannan tarin bayanai?
Za a ƙirƙiri tarin bayanai a: {0}
An shirya Ƙirƙirar Sabon Tarin Bayanai
If you already have a collection you want to open, click the 'Cancel' button.
Idan kana da wani tarin bayanan da kake son ka buɗe, dangwala malatsin 'Soke'.

A collection of shell or template books in one or more languages of wider communication. You will be able to upload these shells to BloomLibrary.org. You may also make a Bloom Pack to give to others so that they can make vernacular books with your shells.

Tarin bayanan kumba ko littafan muhalli a cikin harshe ɗaya ko fiye na gamammiyar sadarwa. Za ka iya ɗora wadannan kumbunan ɗakin karatun Bloom na yanar gizo zuwa BloomLibrary.org.Kuma kana iya yin Ƙunshin Bloom ka ba wasu don su rubuta littafai a cikin wasu harsuna da kumbunan littafanka.
A collection of books in a local language.
Tarin Littafa a cikin harshen gida.
These are optional. Bloom will place them in the right places on title page of books you create.
Waɗannan zaɓi ne.Bloom zai ajiye su wuraren da ya dace akan shafin taken littafan da ka ƙirƙira.

tu.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

tuv.seg: Ƙirƙiri Wani Sabon Tarin Bayanan Bloom
Unable to create a new collection using that name.
An kasa ƙirƙiro wani sabon tarin bayanai ta hanyar amfani da wancan sunan.
You are almost ready to start making books.
In order to keep things simple and organized, Bloom keeps all the books you make in one or more Collections. The first thing we need to do is make one for you.
Don ka aje abu cikin sauƙi kuma a shirye, Bloom zai aje dukkan littafan da ka yi a cikin ɗaya ko fiye na Tarin Bayanai. Abinda mu ke son mu yi shine mu yi maka ɗaya.

Bloom detected that this collection is located in your Dropbox folder. This can cause problems as Dropbox sometimes locks Bloom out of its own files. If you have problems, we recommend that you move your collection somewhere else or disable Dropbox while using Bloom.

Bloom ya gano wannan tarin bayanai na cikin Akwatin Ajiyarka na DropBox a yanar gizo. Wannan na iya haddasa matsaloli saboda akwatin ajiyar Dropbox na yanar gizo a wasu lokuta da dama yakan rufe Bloom daga kundayen bayanansa. Idan kana da matsaloli, muna baka shawarar ka tura tarin bayananka zuwa wani wuri ko kuma ka rufe akwatin ajiyar Dropbox a lokacin da kake amfani da Bloom.
This collection is part of your 'Sources for new books' which you can see in the bottom left of the Collections tab. It cannot be opened for editing.
Wannan tarin bayanan wnai ɓangare ne na 'Tushen sabbin littafai' waɗanda za ka iya gani daga ƙasa ɓangaren hagu na madannin Tari. Ba a iya buɗe ta don tace bayanai.

tu.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

tuv.seg: Browse for another collection on this computer
Bincika don samun wani tarin bayanai a cikin wannan na'ura mai ƙwaƙwalwa
Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
Yi kwafi daga Chorus Hup akan Sadarwar da ke Tsakanin Na'urori masu aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa

tu.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

tuv.seg:
Has someone else used Send/Receive to share a collection with you?\n
Use one of these red buttons to copy their collection to your computer.\n Later, use Send/Receive to share your work back with them.

Ko wani ya taɓa amfani da Aika/Karɓa don raba tarin bayanai tare da kai?\n Yi amfani da ɗaya daga waɗannan jajayen abin latsawar don kwafe tarin bayanansu a cikin na'urarka mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa.\n Daga ƙarshe, yi amani da aika/karɓa don rarraba aikinka da su.
Maye gurbin Wanda ake da shi
That change is not allowed. Front matter and back matter pages must remain where they are.
Ba a yarda da wancan canjin ba.Abinda ke ƙunshe a shafukan Gaba da na Baya dole ne sukasance a wurin da suke.
Bloom had a problem making a PDF of this book. You may need technical help or to contact the developers. But here are some things you can try:
Bloom ya samu matsala a wurin yin PDF na wannan littafin.Me yiwuwa kana buƙatar taimakon ƙwararei ko ka tuntuɓi waɗanda su ka yi manhajar.Amma ga waɗansu abubuwan da za ka jarraba yi:
Try doing this on a computer with more memory
Ka yi ƙoƙarin yin wannan a cikin na'ura mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwar da ta ke da isasshen wurin aje bayanai
Restart your computer and try this again right away
Ka kashe da sake kunna na'urarka a wannan lokacin
Replace large, high-resolution images in your document with lower-resolution ones
Ka maye gurbin manya da surorin da ke karau-karau a cikin abuwanda kake da su a na'urarka da wadanda ba su kai su zama karau-karau ba
Pages can not be re-ordered when you are translating a book.
Ba a iya sake tsarin shafuka a lokacin da kake fassara littatfi.
Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
Don Allah ka sa manhajar Adobe saboda Bloom ya iya nuna littafinka da ka kammala.Kafin sannan, za ka iya aje Littafin da aka yi a PDF ka kuma buɗe shi a cikin wata manhajar.

That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF.
You can still try saving the PDF Book.
Wannan sabon abu ne...Manhajar buɗe aikin da aka yi a Adobe ta bayar da matsala a lokacin da aka yi ƙoƙarin nuna wancan PDF ɗin.Har yanzu za ka iya ƙoƙarin jarraba Littafin PDF ɗin.

Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\n
Please uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\n
Until you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.

Mugun Labari. Bloom ya kasa samun manhajar Adobe da za ya nuna anan, saboda haka Bloom ba ya iya nuna littafinka da ka kammala.\n Don Allah ka cire manhajar 'Adobe Reader' sannan ka sake sa manhajar 'Adobe Reader' din.\n Kafin ka gyara wannan matsalar, har yanzu za ka iya aje Littafin PDF ka kuma buɗe shi a cikin wata manhajar.
Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
Yi ɗan karamin littafi daga cikin shafukan littafin.Za a shimfida shafuka a sake tsara su saboda idan ka lankwasa su za ka samu dan karamin littafi.\n
Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
Ɗora akan ɗakin karatun yanar gizon BloomLibrary.org, inda wurin da sauran mutane za su iya saukarwa kuma su mayar da shi a cikin harshensu.
Make a PDF of just the front and back (both sides), so you can print on colored paper.
Yi PDF na gaba da baya kawai (kowane ɓangare), don ka iya wallafawa akan takarda mai kala.
This PDF viewer can be improved by installing the free Adobe Reader on this computer.
Ana iya inganta wannan mahangin PDF ta hanyar sa manhajar Adobe Reader ta kyauta a cikin wannan na'urar

tu.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

tuv.seg: One page per piece of paper

tu.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

tuv.seg: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
Ka yi PDF na kowane shafin littafin, shafi ɗaya a kowace takarda.
Open the PDF in the default system PDF viewer
Ka buɗe PDF a cikin tsarin madubin PDF na asali
All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)
Ba a yarda a yi aiki da wannan ba tare da izini ba (Tuntubi Mai haƙƙin Mallaka don neman izini.)
BloomLibrary.org already has a previous version of this book from you. If you upload it again, it will be replaced with your current version.
Dama can ɗakin Karatun yanar gizo na BloomLibrary.org na da wannan littafin domin kai. Idan ka sake ɗora shi, zai maye gurbn wanda ke akwai.
There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
An samu wata matsalar a lokacin saukar da littafinka.Ka kashe da sake kunna Bloom ko kuma ka nemi taimakon ƙwararre.

There was a problem downloading the book: something took too long. You can try again at a different time, or write to us at issues@bloomlibrary.org if you cannot get the download to work from your location.

An sami wata matsala a wurin saukar da littafin: Wani abu ya ɗauki lokaci mai tsawo. Za ka iya sake jarraba yin hakan a wani lokaci na daban, ko ka rubuto mana zuwa ga issues@bloomlibrary.org idan ba ka iya samun saukarwa da zaka iya amfani da shi daga wurin da kake ba.
Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
Yi haƙuri, an sami matsala a wurin ɗora {0}. Wasu bayanai za su biyo. Kana iya neman taimakon ƙwararre
One or more fields above need your attention before uploading
Fili ɗaya ko fiye da hakan na neman kulawarka kafin ɗorawa
Yi haƙuri, ba a yi nasarar ɗora "{0}" ba
By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes
Ta hanyar ɗorawa, ka tabbatar da amincewarka da sharuɗɗan Ɗakin karatun Bloom kuma ka bayar da damar da ya bayyana
There was a problem uploading your book.
An sami wata matsala a lokacin ɗora littafinka.
We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
Ba mu iya buɗa maka hanya da wannan adireshin, saboda muna da wani asusu da irin wannan adireshin.Ko za ka so ka dai shiga ɗin?
Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
Bloom ba ya shiga rumbun yanar gizo don tantance shigar da kake son yi.Don Allah ka binciki haɗin sadawar yanar gizonka.
Ba a yi nasarar shiga ba
Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.

Bloom ya kasa haɗuwa da rubun sadarwa na yanar gizo don kammala shigarka ko yin rijistar shigarka.Wannan na iya kasancewa matsala ce daga layin sadawarka na yanar gizo, ko rumbun sadarwar yanar gizonmu ko kuma wasu kayan aikin da ke tsakani.
In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
Don yin rijistar shiga ɗakin karatu na yanar gizo (BloomLibrary.org), dole ne ka bincika akwatin da ke nuna cewa ka yarda da sharuɗɗan amfani da ɗakin karatun Bloom na yanar gizo.
Ana buƙatar Adireshin wasiƙar Yanar gizo
We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
Ba mu da bayanin wani mai amfani da ke da irin wannan adireshin wasikar yanar gizo.Ko kana buƙatar yin rijistar shiga?
Password and user ID did not match
Kalmar Izinin shiga da Shaidar mai amfani ba su zo daidai ba
Please agree to terms of use
Don Allah ka amince da sharuɗɗan amfani
Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
Don Allah ka sa adireshin wasiƙar yanar gizo mai aiki.Za mu aika maka da wasiƙar yanar gizo zuwa wannan adireshin, don ka sake saitin kalmar izinni shigarka.
Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
Bloom ya kasa haɗuwa da rumbun sadarwa na yanar gizo don sake saitin kalmar neman izinin shigarka.Don Allah ka binciki haɗin sadarwar yanar gizonka.
Ba a yi nasarar sake saitin kalmar neman izinin shigarka ba
Ana sake saitin kalmar neman izin shiga
We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password
Muna kan aikawa da wasiƙar yanar gizo zuwa ga {0} da ka'idoji kan yadda za ka sake saitin kalmar neman izinin shigarka
Yi ristar shiga Dakin karatun Bloom.
Ba a san wannan mai amfanin ba
Bloom could not log in to BloomLibrary.org using your saved credentials. Please check your network connection.
Bloom ya kasa buɗe ɗakin karatun yanar gizon Bloom (BloomLibrary.org) ta hanyar amfani da bayananka da ka bayar. Don Allah ka binciki haɗin sadawar yanar gizonka.
Fita daga zauren yanar gizo na karatun Bloom.org
Sorry, this version of Bloom Desktop is not compatible with the current version of BloomLibrary.org. Please upgrade to a newer version.
Yi haƙuri, wannan tsarin Bloom na na'ura mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ta tebur bai dace da sabon tsarin zauren karatun yanar gizo na BloomLibrary.org baDon Allah ka ɗaga darajar manhajar zuwa sabon tsari
Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
Don Allah ka shiga zauren karatu na yanar gizon BloomLibrary.org (ko ka yi rista) kafin ka ɗora

tu.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.

tuv.seg: Please set this from the edit tab
Don Allah ka yi saitin wannan a cikin wurin tacewa na edit tab
Suggestion: Assigning a Creative Commons License makes it easy for you to clearly grant certain permissions to everyone.
Shawara: Sa Buɗaɗɗen Izinin Aikin Fasaha na sauƙaƙa maka wurin bayar da izini ga kowa da kowa ƙarara
Suggestion: Creative Commons Licenses make it much easier for others to use your book, even if they aren't fluent in the language of your custom license.
Shawara: Budaɗɗen Izinin Aikin Fasaha na ƙara sauƙaƙa ma wasu yin amfani da littafinka, koda ba su ƙware ba a harshen da ka yi aiki na izini wanda aka saba.

There was a problem uploading your book. This is probably because your computer is set to use the wrong timezone or your system time is badly wrong. See http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclock/help/wclo_setsysclock.html for how to fix this.

An sami wata matsala a lokacin ɗora littafinka.Wataƙila don an yi saitin na'urarka ta yi amfani da lokacin wani yankin da ba daidai ba ko saitn agogon na'urarka ba ya da kyau.Duba http://www.di-mgt.com.au/wclo/help/wclo_setsysclock.html don ganin yadda za ka saita wannan.
Congratulations, "{0}" is now available on BloomLibrary.org ({1})
Muna taya ka murna, "{0}' yanzu yana kan ɗakin karatun Bloom na yanar gizo BloomLibrary.org ({1})
Ba a yarda da a ɗorawa ba
There was a problem uploading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
An sami wata matsala a lokacin ɗora littafinka.Ka kashe da sake kunna Bloom ko kuma ka nemi taimakon ƙwararre.

tu.note: In this step, Bloom is uploading things like title, languages, and topic tags to the bloomlibrary.org database.

tuv.seg: Ka shiga zauren karatu na BloomLibrary.org
Yi ristar shiga Ɗakin karatu na BloomLibrary.org
About Word Lists and Sample Texts: When you place text files in your sample texts folder, the Decodable Reader Tool can find words to suggest while you are creating your readers.
Don't have a word list for you language yet? Consider using SIL's free WeSay software and the RapidWords.net technique to easily collect lots of words and get started on a dictionary.
Don't have texts for your language yet? Check out SIL's free SayMore software. With it you can record people and then transcribe what they said.
Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.
Don Allahh sa rubutu a cikin akwatin samfurin rubutu.
Click on letters to add them to this stage.
Dangwala haruffa don ka sa su a cikin wannan matakin.
E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
Misali "ai oo sh ng th ing"
Kundi aje bayani na bukatar ƙarin .TXT
Ba a iya karanta wannan tsarin
Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
Ka taimaka wurin kawo da mayar da kundayen aje bayanan da za a yi amfani da su a amtsayin samfurin matannai
List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.
Ka jera haruffa da haɗa kalmomi a cikin tsarin baƙaƙe.
Ka raba ta hanyar sakin filaye
To help you make decodable readers, Bloom needs to know the letters and letter combinations that you will be teaching.
Don taimaka yin masu karatu karɓau, Bloom na bukatar sanin haruffa da hade-haden haruffan da za ka rika koyarwa.
Separate each letter or letter combination with a space. For example, here is what we might use for the English language:
Raba kowane harafi ko haɗin harafi da fili.Misali, ga abinda me yiwuwa za mu yi amfani da shi a harshen Turanci:
Notice that the English list includes symbols that are used to make words, like ' in
Kula cewa jerin Turanci ya haɗa da alamomin da ake amfani da su ayi kalma, kamar 'a cikin
Open the sample texts folder for this language.
Buɗe akwatin samfurin rubutu don wannan harshe.
Jawo jerukan don sake tsara matakai.
Jawo jerukan don sake tsara matakai.
Iyakar yawan Kalmomi a cikin kowace Jimla
Saita Kayan aikin Mai karatu Karɓau
Saita Kayan Aikin Matakin Ayyanannen Maikaratu
set up the alphabet for this language.
Mene ne kalmomin da ake gani?
Things to remember for this level:
Abubuwan da ya kamata a tuna da su a wannan matakin:
To help you make decodable readers, Bloom can suggest words that fit within the current stage. There are two ways to give words to Bloom:
Don taimka ka yi Karɓaɓɓun masu karatu, Bllom na iya bayar da shawarar kalmomin da za su dace da wannan matakin da ake ciki.Akwai hanyoyi biyu na ba Bllom kalmomi:

In addition, this Bloom Pack will carry your latest decodable and leveled reader settings for the \"{0}\" language.
Anyone opening this Bloom Pack , who then opens a \"{0}\" collection, will have their current decodable and leveled reader settings replaced by the settings in this Bloom Pack. They will also get the current set of words for use in decodable readers.

Ƙari kan hakan, wannan Ƙunshin Bloom ɗin zai ɗauki sabon saitin karɓau da ayyanannen maikaratunka don \"{0}\" harshe.Duk wanda zai buɗe wannan Ƙunshin Bloom, wanda ya buɗe tarin bayanan \:{0}"\ za su sami saitinsu na karɓau da ayyanannen mai karatu na yanzu a cikin wannan Ƙunshin Blom ɗin.Kuma za su sami saitin kalmomi na yanzu da ake amfani da su a cikin masu karatu karɓau.
The following books will be made into templates:
Waɗannan littafan da ke biye za a yi su a cikin muhallan:
Ka yi Muhallin Maikaratu na Manhajar Bloom

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

tuv.seg: Please take a minute to register {0}
Don Allah ka sadaukar da ɗan lokaci don yin ristar {0}

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

tuv.seg: I'm stuck, I'll finish this later.
Aiki ya sha man kai, zan ƙare wannan a nan gaba.

tu.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Shown in the button that closes the dialog after a successful report submission.

tuv.seg: Bloom was not able to submit your report directly to our server. Please retry or email {0} to {1}.
Bloom ya kasa aika rahoto kai tsaye zuwa ga rumbun aje bayanan mu na yanar gizo. Don Allah ka ƙara jarraba aikawa ko ka aika saƙo ta adirshin yanar gizo {0} zuwa {1}.
Haɗa da wannan hoton abubuwan da na'urarka mai aiki da ƙwaƙwalwa ta nuna

tu.note: Shown if there was an error submitting the report. Lets the user try submitting it again.

tuv.seg: See what else will be submitted
Duba kuma abinda za a sake aikawa

tu.note: This is shown while Bloom is sending the problem report to our server.

tuv.seg: Aikawa zuwa ga rumbun ajiya na yanar gizo...
We received your report, thanks for taking the time to help make Bloom better!
Mun karɓi rahotonka, muna godiya da lokacin da ka ɗauka don taimakawa wurin kyautata Bloom!
What seems to be the problem?

tu.note: This is shown while Bloom is creating the problem report. It's generally too fast to see, unless you include a large book.

tuv.seg: Ba zai zama abin sirri ba
I get it. Do not show this again.
Na same shi.Kar a ƙara nuna wannan.
Please notice the sample printer settings below. Use them as a guide while you set up the printer.
Don Allah ka lura da samfurin saitin na'urar wallafawa da ke ƙasa. Ka yi amfani da su a matsayin jagora a lokacin da kake saitin na'urar wallafawa.
